mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_operation_log ( id, module_name, business_name, operation_role, operation_data, operation_type, operation_ip, source, creater_id, create_time ) VALUES
( UUID(), #{item.moduleName}, #{item.businessName}, #{item.operationRole}, #{item.operationData}, #{item.operationType}, #{item.operationIp}, #{item.source}, #{item.createrId}, sysdate() )
